annotations.description: Thanks to Bespoke Post for sponsoring this video. New subscribers get 20% off their first box by using my code 20CHEM: https://bspk.me/chem3 Here are five de...
annotations.title: The 5 Easiest TEQUILA Cocktails

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) reposado tequila
.5oz (15ml) mezcal
2 dashes of Angostura bitters
1 barspoon agave nectar
Orange twist

Add a large ice cube to a rocks glass
Add in all liquid ingredients and stir to chill
Light a match and express the oils of the orange peel over the flame into the glass
Drop in the orange peel

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aLwBI_i6MQw
title: Oaxaca Old Fashioned
